description: 1 x Laurel - Approximately 5.00m. Fell to ground level.   Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Cypress Macrocarpa (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 17.00m.  Remove major dead wood and diseased branches throughout crown. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Conifer (applicants ref. T4) - Fell to as near to ground level as is practicable.  Retain stump. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Thuja (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 9.00m.  Remove 1 x over weighted limb which is leaning across the pond.  Remove Ivy from the crown.  Remove dead stems and major dead wood from live stems. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.2 x Mature Yew (applicants ref. T8  T9) - Approximately 11.00m.  Raise crowns by approximately 1.50-2.00m.  Remove major dead wood throughout crowns. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
